name: Chespin
flavorText: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.

name: Fennekin
flavorText: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Froakie
flavorText: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

name: Sylveon
flavorText: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Xerneas
flavorText: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.
Attack1Text: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokemon. For each of those Pokemon, search your deck for a Fairy Energy card and attach it to that Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Yveltal
flavorText: When this legendary Pokemon's wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of all living creatures.
Attack1Text: Attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Xerneas-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use X Blast during your next turn.

name: Yveltal-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Move an Energy from this Pokemon to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Garchomp-EX
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Dragalge
flavorText: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.
Ability1Text: Your opponent's Poisoned Pokemon can't retreat.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Skiddo
flavorText: Thought to be one of the first Pokemon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Honedge
flavorText: Apparently this Pokemon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Slash attack's base damage is 40.

name: Machamp
flavorText: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.
Ability1Text: Each of your Fighting Pokemon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Trevenant
flavorText: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Slurpuff
flavorText: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Gogoat
flavorText: It can tell how its trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathetic sense lets them run as if one being.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Grass Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Charizard-EX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for M Charizard-EX, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 30 damage to itself.

name: Chesnaught-EX
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Delphox-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. This attack does 40 more damage for each Energy card in your opponent's hand.

name: Greninja-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Bronzong
flavorText: In ages past, this Pokemon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Metal Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Darkrai
flavorText: It chases people and Pokemon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is Asleep, this attack does 60 more damage and heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Shiftry
flavorText: A Pokemon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe's mind and take preemptive action.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a Pokemon you find there and put it on the bottom your opponent's deck. If you do, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Greninja
flavorText: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon by your opponent's Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Krookodile-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard a card from your hand. If you can't discard a card, this attack does nothing.

name: Pyroar
flavorText: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Venusaur-EX
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Charizard-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards and attach them to this Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Blastoise-EX
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. Then, your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 30 damage to itself.

name: Xerneas
flavorText: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokemon has no weakness.
Attack2Text: If your opponent has Yveltal (including Yveltal-EX) in play, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Yveltal
flavorText: When this legendary Pokemon's wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If your opponent has Xerneas (including Xerneas-EX) in play, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Metagross-EX
Attack1Text: You may move a Metal Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokemon to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: M Metagross-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Metal Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Treecko
flavorText: Small hooks on the bottom of its feet catch on walls and ceilings. That is how it can hang from above.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Torchic
flavorText: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Mudkip
flavorText: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.

name: Kingdra
flavorText: It stores energy by sleeping at underwater depths at which no other life-forms can survive.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 4 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Discard a Water and a Lightning Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Ditto
flavorText: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, it can use the attacks of your opponent's Active Pokemon. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)
Attack1Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokemon.

name: Kyogre-EX
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Return 2 Water Energy attached to this Pokemon to your hand.

name: Groudon-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Diancie-EX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

name: M Diancie-EX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to each of your Pokemon from your opponent's Pokemon-EX. (If this Pokemon is no longer your Active Pokemon, this effect ends.)

name: Gallade-EX
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has no Energy attached to it, this attack does 40 more damage.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Cross Slash during your next turn.

name: Altaria
flavorText: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.
Ability1Text: Each of your Colorless Pokemon has no Weakness.

name: Heliolisk
flavorText: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.
Ability1Text: Any damage done to this Pokemon by an attack from 1 of your opponent's Water Pokemon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Meowstic
flavorText: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Regirock
flavorText: The same rocks that form its body have been found in ground layers around the world.
Attack1Text: Put 2 Stadium cards from your discard pile into your hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Pangoro
flavorText: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won't put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, it gets +20 HP for each of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Kyogre
flavorText: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Groudon
flavorText: This legendary Pokemon is said to represent the land. It went to sleep after dueling Kyogre.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Sceptile-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Strong Slash during your next turn.

name: Blaziken-EX
Attack1Text: Attach an Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Swampert-EX
Attack1Text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. This attack does 40 more damage for each Water Energy you find there. Shuffle the revealed cards back into your deck.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Blissey
flavorText: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Heal 100 damage from each of your Benched Pokemon. Then, discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Fearow
flavorText: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
Attack1Text: Flip 5 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Malamar
flavorText: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, whenever your opponent flips a coin during his or her turn, treat it as tails.
Attack1Text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Salamence
flavorText: It's uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Discard the top card of your deck.

name: Gyarados
flavorText: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each damage counter on each of your Benched Magikarp.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage. If tails, this Pokemon does 30 damage to itself.

name: Flygon-EX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, you may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Absol-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random card from your opponent's hand.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: M Absol-EX
Attack1Text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck. If that card is a Trainer card, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Rayquaza
flavorText: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's.)
Attack1Text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Latios
flavorText: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender Pokemon that dislikes fighting.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Rayquaza-EX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for M Rayquaza-EX, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Jirachi
flavorText: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
Attack1Text: Discard a Special Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon. If you do, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Both Active Pokemon are now Asleep.

name: Jirachi
flavorText: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
Attack1Text: Discard a Special Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon. If you do, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Both Active Pokemon are now Asleep.

name: Chesnaught
flavorText: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Rayquaza-EX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for M Rayquaza-EX, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Tyrantrum-EX
Ability1Text: Damage from this Pokemon's attacks isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Discard 3 Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Hoopa-EX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your deck for up to 3 Pokemon-EX (except for Hoopa-EX), reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 100 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Latios-EX
Attack1Text: If you go first, you can use this attack on your first turn.
Attack2Text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Rayquaza-EX
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon can't use Dragon Strike during your next turn.

name: Reshiram
flavorText: When Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Palkia
flavorText: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.
Attack2Text: Your opponent can't attach Energy from his or her hand to the Defending Pokemon during his or her next turn.

name: Zekrom
flavorText: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Dialga
flavorText: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.
Attack2Text: Your opponent can't play any Pokemon from his or her hand to evolve the Defending Pokemon during his or her next turn.

name: Latias
flavorText: It can telepathically communicate with people. It changes its appearance using its down that refracts light.
Attack1Text: Draw a card. If Latios is on your Bench, draw 1 more card.

name: Latios
flavorText: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender Pokemon that dislikes fighting.
Attack2Text: If Latias is on your Bench, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Black Kyurem
flavorText: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: White Kyurem
flavorText: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Flare Blizzard during your next turn.

name: Regigigas
flavorText: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokemon towed continents with ropes.
Ability1Text: Whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to this Pokemon, heal 20 damage from it.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Arceus
flavorText: It is told in mythology that this Pokemon was born before the universe even existed.
Attack1Text: Move as many Energy as you like from your Benched Pokemon to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each different type of basic Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Pikachu-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Discard all Lightning Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 50 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.

name: Hoopa-EX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Item cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: M Blaziken-EX
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Moonsault Blaze attack does 100 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: M Swampert-EX
Attack1Text: You may do 30 more damage. If you do, discard the top 3 cards of each player's deck.

name: Chespin
flavorText: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn't faze it.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: If Hoopa is on your Bench, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Hoopa
flavorText: It gathers things it likes and pushes them through its loop to teleport them to a secret place.
Attack1Text: If Pikachu is on your Bench, draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Sableye
flavorText: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to your Benched Pokemon-EX in any way you like.

name: Celebi
flavorText: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.
Ability1Text: When this Pokemon is Knocked Out, flip a coin. If heads, shuffle this Pokemon and all cards attached to it into your deck, and your opponent can't take any Prize cards for it.
Attack1Text: Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Trevenant
flavorText: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It's kind to the Pokemon that reside in its body.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, the attacks of your opponent's Basic Pokemon cost Colorless more.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from both Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Umbreon
flavorText: When exposed to the moon's aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it's filled with a mysterious power.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
Attack2Text: Turn 1 of your face-down Prize cards face up. If that Prize card is a Pokemon, this attack does 60 more damage. (That Prize card remains up for the rest of the game.)

name: Aerodactyl-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: M Aerodactyl-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Mewtwo
flavorText: A Pokemon created by recombining Mew's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Zen Blade during your next turn.

name: Mewtwo
flavorText: A Pokemon created by recombining Mew's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Zen Blade during your next turn.

name: Aurorus-EX
Ability1Text: Each of your Pokemon that has any Water Energy attached to it can't be Paralyzed. (If any of those Pokemon are Paralyzed, remove that Special Condition.)
Attack1Text: This Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Mawile-EX
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: M Mawile-EX
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Gyarados-EX
Attack1Text: Flips a coin until you get tails. For each heads, search your deck for a Water Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Psychic Energy attached to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Switch all damage counters on this Pokemon with those on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Machamp-EX
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 80 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from this Pokemon.

name: Gyarados
flavorText: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Mew
flavorText: Its DNA is said to contain the genetic codes of all Pokemon, so it can use all kinds of techniques.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Celebi
flavorText: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokemon and put it onto that Pokemon. (This counts as evolving that Pokemon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Jirachi
flavorText: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
Attack1Text: Draw 3 cards. This Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Manaphy
flavorText: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Water Pokemon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Darkrai
flavorText: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep. Your opponent flips 2 coins instead of 1 between turns. If either of them is tails, that Pokemon is still Asleep.

name: Shaymin
flavorText: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude and the message it delivers.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Arceus
flavorText: It is told in mythology that this Pokemon was born before the universe even existed.
Attack1Text: Choose Grass, Fire, Water, Lightning, Psychic, Fighting, Darkness, Metal, Fairy, or Dragon type. Until the ends of your next turn, this Pokemon is that type.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Victini
flavorText: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Keldeo
flavorText: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are too fast to follow.
Ability1Text: This Pokemon's attacks do 50 more damage to your opponent's Darkness Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: This Pokemon can't use Sacred Sword during your next turn.

name: Genesect
flavorText: This Pokemon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Meloetta
flavorText: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Charizard-EX
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Combustion Blast during your next turn.

name: Blastoise-EX
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. The, your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this Pokemon does 30 damage to itself.

name: Venusaur-EX
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Mew-EX
Ability1Text: This Pokemon can use the attacks of any Pokemon in play (both yours and your opponent's). (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)
Attack1Text: Move as many Energy attached to your Pokemon to your other Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Moltres
flavorText: One of the legendary bird Pokemon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.
Attack2Text: You may do 40 more damage. If you do, this Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: White Kyurem
flavorText: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body becomes frozen when the energy leaked out.
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon has any Fire Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Zygarde
flavorText: It's hypothesized that it's monitoring those those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Tyranitar
flavorText: If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may attach 1 Darkness Energy from your discard pile to this Pokemon for each Prize card your opponent has taken.
Attack1Text: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. This attack does 50 more damage for each Supporter card discard in this way.

name: Pansear
flavorText: This Pokemon lives in caves with volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Gastly
flavorText: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

name: Ash-Greninja-EX
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Ninja Blade during your next turn.

name: Empoleon BREAK
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage times the number of Pokemon your opponent has in play.

name: Beheeyem BREAK
Attack1Text: Move as many Psychic Energy attached to your Pokemon to your other Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Noctowl BREAK
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. This attack does 30 more damage for each Trainer card you find there.

name: Vivillon
flavorText: The patterns on this Pokemon's wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Froakie
flavorText: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Floette
flavorText: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Lucario
flavorText: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Rayquaza
flavorText: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Discard 1 Fire Energy and 1 Lightning Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Azelf
flavorText: It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf all came from the same egg.
Attack1Text: Put 2 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokemon that has any damage counters on it.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Magikarp
flavorText: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Yanmega
flavorText: This six-legged Pokemon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.
Ability1Text: If you have exactly 4 cards in your hand, ignore all Energy in the attack cost of each of this Pokemon's attacks.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has a Pokemon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: Volcanion
flavorText: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.
Attack1Text: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokemon. Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to each of those Pokemon.

name: Clawitzer
flavorText: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Special Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Mega Evolution Pokemon.

name: Hoopa
flavorText: It is said to be able to seize anything it desires with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power sealed, it is transformed into a much smaller form.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Portal Strike during your next turn.

name: Shaymin-EX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 20 damage from each of your Benched Basic Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Heal 20 damage and remove all Special Conditions from this Pokemon.

name: Xerneas-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use X Blast during your next turn.

name: Yveltal-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Move an Energy from this Pokemon to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Yveltal-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Move an Energy from this Pokemon to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Zygarde-EX
Attack1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Zygarde
flavorText: It's hypothesized that it's monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Ho-Oh
flavorText: It will reveal itself before a pure-hearted Trainer by shining its bright, rainbow-colored wings.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Ho-Oh BREAK
Attack1Text: This Pokemon can't use Shining Flame during your next turn.

name: Wobbuffet BREAK
Attack1Text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon. During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokemon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon equal to the damage done to this Pokemon.

name: Lugia
flavorText: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Beedrill-EX
Attack1Text: Discard up to 2 Pokemon Tool cards attached to your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: M Beedrill-EX
Attack1Text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon. Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokemon between turns.

name: Black Kyurem
flavorText: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any Lightning Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Braixen
flavorText: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Greninja
flavorText: It appears and vanishes with a ninja's grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.

name: Weezing
flavorText: Very rarely, a sudden mutation can result in two small Koffing twins becoming conjoined as a Weezing.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has any Energy attached to it, this Pokemon has no Retreat Cost.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Volcanion
flavorText: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Magearna
flavorText: Magearna, with its metallic body, is an artificial Pokemon created 500 years ago by humans.
Attack1Text: Heal 40 damage from 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of different types of Pokemon on your opponent's Bench.

name: M Gengar-EX
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.

name: Garchomp-EX
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: M Garchomp-EX
Attack1Text: This Pokemon does 10 damage to itself for each damage counter on it.

name: Salamence-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 more damage for each of your opponent's Pokemon-EX.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Dragon Strike during your next turn.

name: M Salamence-EX
Attack1Text: Discard as many basic Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon as you like. This attack does 40 more damage for each Energy card you discarded in this way.

name: Volcanion-EX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. If you do, during this turn, your Basic Fire Pokemon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: This Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Pikachu-EX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Magearna-EX
Ability1Text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to each of your Pokemon that has any Metal Energy attached to it. (Existing effects are not removed.)
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Soul Blaster attack's base damage is 60.

name: Absol
flavorText: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom bringer.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), discard a random card from your opponent's hand.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Snorlax
flavorText: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.
Ability1Text: This Pokemon can't be affected by any Special Conditions. (Remove any Special Conditions affecting this Pokemon.)
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Arcanine BREAK
Attack1Text: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Crobat BREAK
Attack1Text: You may leave your opponent's Active Pokemon Paralyzed. If you do, shuffle this Pokemon and all cards attached to into your deck.

name: Mandibuzz BREAK
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance. Discard all Pokemon Tool cards attached to each of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Mewtwo-EX
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Giratina
flavorText: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.
Ability1Text: Each Pokemon BREAK has no Abilities (this includes Abilities of its previous Evolution).
Attack1Text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

name: Volcanion
flavorText: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Magearna
flavorText: Magearna, with its metallic body, is an artificial Pokemon created 500 years ago by humans.
Attack1Text: Heal 40 damage from 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of different types of Pokemon on your opponent's Bench.

name: Celebi
flavorText: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokemon and put it onto that Pokemon. (This counts as evolving that Pokemon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Shaymin
flavorText: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Victini
flavorText: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Manaphy
flavorText: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Water Pokemon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Keldeo
flavorText: When it is resolute, it body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.
Ability1Text: This Pokemon's attacks do 50 more damage to your opponent's Darkness Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: This Pokemon can't use Sacred Sword during your next turn.

name: Mew
flavorText: Its DNA is said to contain the genetic codes of all Pokemon, so it can use all kinds of techniques.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Meloetta
flavorText: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Darkrai
flavorText: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during the nights of the new moon.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep. Your opponent flips 2 coins instead of 1 between turns. If either of them is tails, the Pokemon is still Asleep.

name: Jirachi
flavorText: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
Attack1Text: Draw 3 cards. This Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Genesect
flavorText: This Pokemon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Arceus
flavorText: It is told in mythology that this Pokemon was born before the universe even existed.
Attack1Text: Choose Grass, Fire, Water, Lightning, Psychic, Fighting, Darkness, Metal, Fairy, or Dragon type. Until the end of your next turn, this Pokemon is that type.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: M Camerupt-EX
Attack1Text: You may discard the top 3 cards of each player's deck. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage for each Energy card you discarded in this way.

name: M Camerupt-EX
Attack1Text: You may discard the top 3 cards of each player's deck. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage for each Energy card you discarded in this way.

name: M Sharpedo-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon for each Colorless in that Pokemon's Retreat Cost. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: M Sharpedo-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon for each Colorless in that Pokemon's Retreat Cost. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Pikachu
flavorText: When several of these Pokemon gather, their electricity can build and cause lightning storms.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon.
